title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, published on npm as ‘ollama’.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, available on PyPI as ‘ollama’.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or chat component.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (now renamed ‘Open WebUI’); runs in Docker.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial Rust CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API for quick prompting from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot alternative.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android compatibility, published to Maven Central.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem providing idiomatic access to the Ollama API.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir wrapper for Ollama with GenServer-based streaming support.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async/await and streaming chat completions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators in RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama replies into any channel.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat with local Ollama models via Slack threads.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selector and PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up ephemeral Ollama containers for CI testing of LLM features.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + LangChain.
